transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Ji sir, awaz aa rahi hai aapko meri?
Customer: Haan haan awaz mil rahi hai.
Executive: Haan ji, toh abhi free hai karne connect aapko?
Customer: Haan haan sir kar lijiye connect.
Executive: Okay, theek hai. Ek minute dijiye main aapko link share karta hu. Email ID open karo aap apna.

Customer: Hello
Executive: Haan ji sir.
Customer: Hello
Executive: Ji ji.
Customer: Maine aapki email ID pe link share kiya hai Prashant IndiaMART ke naam se.
Customer: Okay okay check kariye aap.

Customer: Whatsapp pe bhejiye kya?
Executive: Nahi email pe bheja hai.
Customer: Email pe.

Customer: Yes.
Executive: Ji hai Prashant IndiaMART, main dekh raha hu use.
Executive: Haan Prashant IndiaMART ke naam se aaya hoga, usko aap join kar lo.


Customer: Join session.

Executive: Usme likh ke aa raha hoga Google Meet with IndiaMART, uspe click karna hai, then aapko join now pe click kar dena hai.

Customer: Ji main kar raha hu.

Customer: Is video meet with IndiaMART team na?
Executive: Haan ji haan ji. Hello, mail mil gaya na pehle aapko India Prashant ke naam se?
Customer: Yes yes mil gaya.
Executive: Haan. Uspe likh ke aa raha hoga join with IndiaMART, join with Google Meet IndiaMART.
Customer: Yes yes uspe yes kariye theek hai na?
Executive: Haan uspe click karo fir aapko ask to join ya join now karke likh ke aayega uspe click karna hai.

Customer: Join with Google Meet.

Customer: Hello
Executive: Haan ji sir.
Customer: Haan wo video meet join karne ke baad toh abhi kuch nahi aa raha hai, sirf aa raha hai niche Prashant IndiaMART organizer. Haan yes yes.
Executive: Toh usi me dekho, upper ki side me hi aapko likh ke aa raha hoga ask to join ya Google Meet with IndiaMART.
Customer: Google Meet with IndiaMART, video meet se.
Executive: Haan haan, Google Meet, Google Meet with IndiaMART.


Customer: Toh nahi aa raha sir isme.
Executive: Nahi hua kya?
Customer: Nahi ye join with Google Meet yes aa raha hai. Niche. 
Executive: Main aapko whatsapp pe share karu kya?
Customer: Haan nahi nahi ye join with Google Meet aa raha hai sir isme.
Executive: Haan usi pe click karna hai.
Customer: Haan sir click kar diya.
Customer: Ji aa raha hu.
Executive: Haan ab ask to join karke aa raha hoga blue colour pe dekhna.
Customer: Haan ji.

Executive: Join now pe click kariye.
Executive: The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain, usne aapki call ko hold pe rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe.
Executive: The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain,
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer unable to join Google Meet.



Resolution:

- Executive guided the customer to join Google Meet.



Next Steps: 

Issue not resolved.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- google meet, technical support, connection issues
